tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE articles(
    article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    published_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    author TEXT NOT NULL,
    content TEXT,
    publish_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE news_articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    author VARCHAR(100),
    publish_date DATE,
    content TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE article_references (
    ref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (article_id) REFERENCES news_articles(article_id),
    tag_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES article_tags(tag_id)
);
CREATE TABLE MediaOrganization (organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY, organization_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE ArticleArchive (
  article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  author VARCHAR(255),
  publish_date DATE,
  content TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Author (
  author_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  bio TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Editor (
  editor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Publisher (
  publisher_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE Department (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  manager VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)
